name: MAXWIL' Fast Food & Bakery
description: Filipino fast food and fresh bakery delivered fast. Order crispy fried chicken, sisig, adobo bowls, pandesal, pastries, and cakes - all made fresh daily. Two great options in one app: MAXWIL' Fast Food for authentic home-style Filipino meals, and MAXWIL' Bakery for fresh baked goods. Fast delivery, affordable prices, quality ingredients. Open 6AM-8PM daily.
